indicator_name: 교정시설 수용자 중 형 미선고자 비율
target_name: 국가적 및 국제적 수준에서 법치를 증진하며, 모두에게 평등한 사법 접근권을 보장

en.target_name: Promote the rule of law at the national and international levels and ensure equal access to justice for all
en.computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
en.indicator_name: Unsentenced detainees as a proportion of overall prison population
en.indicator_definition: The total number of persons held in detention who have not yet been sentenced, as a percentage of the total number of persons held in detention, in a given period. 'Sentenced' refers to persons subject to criminal proceedings who have received a decision from a competent authority regarding their conviction or acquittal. For the purposes of the indicator, persons who have received a 'non-final' decision are considered to be 'sentenced'.
en.graph_title: Unsentenced detainees as a proportion of overall prison population
